column4: Hello everyone. I'm having a bit of a problem with my xorg.conf. Every time I logout or reboot the computer the settings get messed up.
what are you using to edit the settings?
Sorry it took so long to respond. I'm just useing dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
The system finds my card and everything just fine. And when i restart X, all the settings work. But I restart and I lose resolution sizes.
